option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# Selenium QT
A repackaged version of Selenium WebDriver that allows you to use multiple Selenium versions in the same project without conflicts.
## Features
- Relocates all Selenium packages to `io.github.qasecret.selenium_qt` - Includes all Selenium dependencies (relocated to avoid conflicts) - Compatible with Selenium 3.141.0 - Can be used alongside other Selenium versions in the same project
## Usage
### Gradle
Add the following to your `build.gradle` or `build.gradle.kts`:
```kotlin repositories { mavenCentral() // Add your repository where this jar is hosted }
dependencies { implementation("io.github.qasecret:selenium-qt:1.0.0") } ```
### Example Code
```kotlin import io.github.qasecret.selenium_qt.chrome.ChromeDriver import io.github.qasecret.selenium_qt.chrome.ChromeOptions
fun main() { val options = ChromeOptions() val driver = ChromeDriver(options)
try { driver.get("https://www.google.com") println("Page title: ${driver.title}") } finally { driver.quit() } } ```
### Important Notes
1. All Selenium classes are relocated under `io.github.qasecret.selenium_qt` package 2. Common dependencies are relocated to avoid conflicts: - Guava → `io.github.qasecret.selenium_qt.libs.guava` - Apache Commons → `io.github.qasecret.selenium_qt.libs.commons` - ByteBuddy → `io.github.qasecret.selenium_qt.libs.bytebuddy` - Gson → `io.github.qasecret.selenium_qt.libs.gson` - OkHttp3 → `io.github.qasecret.selenium_qt.libs.okhttp3` - Okio → `io.github.qasecret.selenium_qt.libs.okio`
3. You can use this library alongside other versions of Selenium in your project without package conflicts
## Using Multiple Selenium Versions
Example of using both versions in the same project:
```kotlin // Using Selenium QT (relocated version) import io.github.qasecret.selenium_qt.chrome.ChromeDriver as RelocatedChromeDriver
// Using regular Selenium import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver as StandardChromeDriver
fun example() { // Using relocated version val qt = RelocatedChromeDriver()
// Using standard version val standard = StandardChromeDriver()
// Both can be used simultaneously qt.quit() standard.quit() } ```
## License
This project is licensed under the same terms as Selenium WebDriver.
